website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive little Apple Watch charger stand perfectly transforms your watch into a desktop clock for bedtime charging, and it’s a must-have for hardcore Apple fans.
pros: Works with all Apple Watches and chargers
Makes for a stylish bedside clock
cons: Although this stand will hold and charge the Series 4 Apple Watch, part of its screen may be obscured by the silicone frame

customer_reviews.title: Too small for Series 4
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Mac way back in the day so love this concept. Just bought a new Series 4 Apple Watch and this was my next purchase. It's a little too small for Series 4. It still fits in there and it does charge, but part of the watch screen is covered. They state that it is compatible with Series 4 with no caveats so dinging them for that.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Freak

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: These have been going up and down for sale for awhile and I was able to order one while Amazon was selling it. It shipped quickly and Elago even included a free car charger as a "thank you gift". I'm am beyond thrilled. This is so cute and the quality is higher than I expected. This is going to make me smile every night. I just know it. I wasn't expecting to be this thrilled when I ordered it. I was just expecting to think "it's a little cute" but here I am now ordering another one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone will be impressed with your sense of style.
customer_reviews.text: I know what you wanna hear. That this watch dock changed my life. That it gave my existence meaning. You really want to purchase this thing because it’s hip and it’ll make you feel cool, right? Well I’m here to tell you that it totally will make you feel cool. It’ll improve your life so much you’ll have meaning dripping from your ears. Potential sexual partners will be throwing themselves at you because, hey, they realize a person with f***ing taste. No but SRSLY. It’s a capable watch dock that looks like an old-school Apple Mac. It’s fun. It works great. Don’t read too much into it. Buy it and you’ll be happy for ever after.
customer_reviews.author: Philip C

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a novelty item, but it turned out to be really useful!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this stand because I though it was kind of quirky. I love those old classic macs and just found this item to be funny. As it turns out, it's really handy and it's become my regular charging stand. It's heavier than I though it would be so it stays stable on my nightstand and my apple watch just drops into the little slot really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Classic Apple.
customer_reviews.text: A stand any classic Mac enthusiast will love. I've seen the plans that allows you to 3D print these stands, but this one is quite a bit cheaper than buying a 3D printer! The stand fits both my 38mm Apple Watch & my wife's 42mm, but her 42mm looks better. My 38mm kind of sits back at an angle a little & depending on the viewing angle there are slight gaps around the perimeter of the screen cutout. Overall "geek factor" score on this is 5 stars though, it's just plain cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Reviews don't lie - this item would not disappoint you!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the very few purchases in my recent memory that brought a smile of satisfaction to my face. Couple words of caution: - This fits perfectly my 42 mm Apple Watch 3. Smaller 38 mm, or larger 44 mm series 4 may not fit so great. - Standard magnetic charging puck (with 3 ft cord) that came with the watch fits into this stand snugly and securely, like it is a part of the stand. I also bought one-foot long charging puck from Apple, which looks different. The puck itself is chrome, not white, it is smaller in diameter and height. If I tried to fit it into the stand it probably would be a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Rustichetto

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Incredibly useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely for the nostalgia, but love it for how useful it is! Sturdy materials, fits my 40mm Apple Series 5 watch very well. Charger used to fall to floor when I would remove my watch. Between my iPhone and iPad cables, the watch charger always got tangled. So now the charger is always on my nightstand, no more cord management issues. I also love the nightstand mode. I just have to touch the edge of the nightstand, and with just that slight movement the time shows. I no longer have to worry about knocking over my water glass when reaching for my watch to see what time it is.
customer_reviews.author: redcas

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little tricky keeping the mag disk in place. I’m considering epoxy. It pushes out a bit really easily, causing the night stand mode not to work and a few moments of what should be unnecessary adjustment. I use the stainless mesh magnetic band and the band needs to be closed to snug and balance the watch before it sits right. Cute that it looks like a Mac, and definitely easy to travel with. If your hoping you’ll be able to see what time it is mid sleep cycle, you’ll have to reach out toward the holstered watch and maybe even touch it to wake it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Clever and sturdy charger
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple device. This is 3rd charger I've used for my Apple watch and the only one I like. This charger is on an end table alongside my bed. My bed is about the same level as the table and during the night my pillow would slide over and knock watch off whatever charger I was using. And it was not easy to get the watch settled on the other chargers. With this one, it drops right in and stays in place. Plus the display is easy to bring up the time function in an easily readable format. A very simple device but very well designed and effective.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fenske

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Cool Retro Watch Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool accessory for my Apple Watch Series 4 as it does serve as a cool Watch Stand! Getting the charger in the base wasn't so bad, and it seems sturdy to use. Looking at the watch charge head-on serves pretty well, although it may be due to the watch I have is the 40mm variant, which isn't too small to not see. I think it is the perfect fit and appealing as long as you don't try to look at it from above. Well worth the price IMO since you'll know where your watch is while it is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Vir Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't entirely for the Apple Watch series 4 44mm. The battery level circle (upper right corner) starts behind the frame making it impossible to see if the Watch is 100% charged or not.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Time for SE30 Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Cord routes easily behind it when you put your watch charger in it (Does NOT come with cord or charger). Has that classic Apple box look. This easily accommodates a naked or cased watch. The AW has a pretty hefty protective case and this has no problem fitting the watch and case. My kid wants one for her watch. This took me back to my first Mac, an SE30. 2MB of ram and a 40 MB HD were groundbreaking...
customer_reviews.author: BearTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Apple (Watch) II
customer_reviews.text: Elago products are fantastic. I love the look when my Watch is docked in nightstand mode. Such a cool design. I wish it had wireless charging; I tried playing with it myself to turn it into a wireless charging dock, but I'm not an engineer :) I'd gladly give $30 for a wireless charge version. Watch model: Series 3 non-cell, Space Gray
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple Watch Charging Option
customer_reviews.text: While it might seem like an amusing novelty, this rubberized watch stand is highly functional and perhaps the best of all options. The Apple watch will stay secure inside the holder unlike other options where the watch might slip from the charger if it falls off or gets tipped over. There's no fumbling around to mount the charger against the watch back; just slide it in and go.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Too cute for words! Glue some foam for place holder when watch is not in it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and so very, very cute - especially for those of us that remember this little guy and know about Hello World! Don’t hesitate to buy. Using for my apple watch series 4. I think it needs a place holder for when the watch is not in it so I glued some foam into the paper thing that came with it. Works fine and looks so cute on the dresser. They should make a good place holder for this. I’d buy it.
customer_reviews.author: gardener97

customer_reviews.title: YAAAAAAAASSSSSS!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one the cutest charging stands out there! It holds the magnetic Apple Watch Charger very securely. My 38mm Apple Watch Series 3 fits nicely inside. The charger cord can be tucked a bit inside the bottom of the stand and there is a nook for the cord to fit through so the stand can rest flat on a surface. Any Macintosh / Apple fan will find delight with this throw back product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiInMinnesota

customer_reviews.title: FOR ALL Apple Watch LOVERS...SO DARN CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grandma who loves all Apple products. One of my friends at my Mac Users Group showed this little charger to us and I knew right then my Mac loving grandkids would like this little Apple Watch charger. It is a great little gadget and I bought one for myself. It works great and is a cute little addition to my office. Really cute!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Flexible Material Works w/ 42mm and Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a third part charging stand for my Apple Watch for a while so it is easy to mount and keep in "night stand" mode. I have a protective case around my 42mm watch to keep it protected from doorway knocks. This stand is great looking for those of us that remember the original Classic Mac, but it is also made of flexible material so my 42mm with a protective case fits fine in the stand. I love the look and would highly recommend it to any Apple geek.
customer_reviews.author: technojerry

customer_reviews.title: Small and functional
customer_reviews.text: This little guy replaced a huge plastic thingy that worked well enough but took up way to much space on my nightstand. This inexpensive little rubbery guy works perfectly and my watch is much more stable than where it sat on my previous charger which was basically just a little shelf. Great solution at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Looks adorable and is quite functional.
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy this thing is. It was easy to set up and my watch immediately connects to charge when I put it in the slot. I have a series 5 40mm watch and was worried that it wouldn’t connect properly or need adjusting upon inserting, but no! I just slide it in and it connects and charges right away. I love the way it looks, I can’t help but smile when I see it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: A cute, retro tool, perfect for a desktop
customer_reviews.text: This charging stand makes your charging Apple Watch relatively easy to see, and gives your desktop a familiar, humorous sense, cheering you up when everything else is going on. Not really designed for travel, it still fits easily into a suit, bag or briefcase. Very nice, though your non-techie friends might never get why you enjoy it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Berg

customer_reviews.title: A great stand.
customer_reviews.text: A great little stand that works well with my 38mm watch. It does look to also work with the 42mm watch, which means that with 38mm there is some play. I have not had any issue getting my watch to charge, but I am always concerned that it might not, because of that play. It would be nice if there was a 38mm and a 42mm version. As I said though, I have had no issues. I especially love that the back of the mac is hollow, so I can hide some of the cable up there. I am pleased and would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mictek

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest product—a watch charger in Mac screen! Well look closely it not a charger it’s just a plastic holder and when you install the charger it doesn’t work well. In fact if you aren’t very careful in placement you will wake up to a drained battery! You heard it here don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Sa Newe

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this little stand. I put on my night stand next to bed. I have an apple 3 watch, 42mm . The charger and watch fit it it with no issue. i did find that the watch sits better in the stand when the watch dial is facing up and the band is buckled/snapped together. The stand turns the watch into alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: LoMay

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: The SE was one of the first computers i used, so this was completely nostalgic purchase and 100% worth it! Its a softer material so it wont scratch anything. You can shove excess cord into the empty cavity on the bottom. I got 2. One for my night stand and one i keep in my car. They have both held up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D.

customer_reviews.title: Super Apple Watch holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself and my wife and we both are 100% pleased with it! It holds the watch securely and protects it and makes watch (by position) a great nighttime clock and nightstand addition. And I love the retro-look of the original Macintosh (if you order the white)--a great giggle. I would definitely buy it again...and recommend it above all the other Apple watch holders.
customer_reviews.author: R.Baker

customer_reviews.title: SO Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these as gifts for our entire family! They’re so cute and cool! Well made and do t take up a lot of space! And what Apple product lover wouldn’t just adore a tiny replica of the original Mac?! Reminds me of the first computer I used back in 80’s middle school!
customer_reviews.author: Jones Family

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: The charger fits into its place perfectly. It's charges no problem. I have the 44mm watch, and the battery circle is slightly obscured, but it's not a problem for me. If i want to watch it charge, I'll remove the charger from this stand. I highly recommend this. It's high quality, well finished, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sally

customer_reviews.title: Fun little watch stand!
customer_reviews.text: Made of solid silicone, super cute, fits my big 44mm Apple Watch 4 in it well enough that you can easily see the time in nightstand mode. It covers a tiny bit of the charging icon but that does not bother me, and the watch body doesn’t stick out of the top or sides awkwardly of the tiny “Mac” at all. I even kept the cable in it and threw the whole thing into my luggage on a recent trip and it kept my watch charge and in a safe spot rather than trying to have just the cable or investing in a more expensive travel charging case.
customer_reviews.author: Lucianthinuscrystalni

customer_reviews.title: Functionality matches great look
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, this is the best charging stand I've seen for the Apple Watch. And of course, the cool factor is off the charts. I just drop my watch into the slot, and it connects and shows me the time almost instantly. They had a great idea with this stand, and they executed it with precision and craftsmanship. I have a 42mm Watch Sport, Series 1, and it fits perfectly. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: John StJohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: There are a wide variety of stands. This stand fills all the needs I require. I do want to share a valuable ability not mentioned in any reviews. My first stand failed. The reason was the the protector I put on the watch made it thick enough that the magnet failed. This stand fit the watch and charged it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: Charges watch easily and reliably
customer_reviews.text: While it has a neat appearance looking like the old Mac Classic computer, it's real benefit is that when the Apple Watch is installed properly, it is secure and thus you can have the confidence of a good, full charge. Nice to have it double as a clock beside the bed also. Will be a good item for travel as it takes up little space and is not easily damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was just exactly what I expected! It's a nice heavy silicone feel, not lightweight or cheap. Perfect so my blind a$$ won't knock it over in the middle of the night fumbling around! The charger is easy to put in - take the USB end and slide it through the 'screen' and down, make sure you put the charging side outwards, and wham! Cute little Mac display for your watch, and at a great angle for a nightstand. Couldn't be more perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Foxtato

customer_reviews.title: The cutest watch charger EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister got this charger a couple of months ago and I finally succumbed and moved it from my "save for later" to my cart and bought it. I had no idea how much joy it would bring me!!!! It looks like your old Mac SE with the watch turned off and when you tap the screen, comes to life. OMG SOOOO CUTE and very well made. My watch has a stone band on it, matches perfectly. Couldn't ask for a cuter watch charger for my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Z. Freed

customer_reviews.title: A great Apple Watch stand and a worthy companion for my original Macintosh!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. I saw this on Amazon for about 10 seconds and I decided to buy it. I bought a multiple units for gifts and the recipients love them. I save one for myself--that was a before I even got an Apple Watch! It was an impulse buy. But then again, I have the very original Macintosh that looks like this stand. I had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: BlueOwl

customer_reviews.title: To quote Marie Kondo, this little rubber watch stand sparks joy
customer_reviews.text: Your are basically paying $10 for a rubber holder for your Apple Watch and Charger but everytime I see it, it puts a smile on my face because it reminds me of the old school Macs in school. It's nice to have a dedicated spot to charge your Watch and place it when you get home. May be expensive for some but if it sparks joy get one.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Au-Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have two Apple watches the original watch and Watch 4 - I just drop/slide-in the watch and bingo it makes contact and charges - and its a night stand clock. I should also mention that I loved my first Macs (128/512/Plus, yup I had all three) and I smile whenever it use this charger.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: So cute on nightstand.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this, my first computer was the original Macintosh computer so I had to have this. Not hard plastic to scratch your watch, soft, flexible. Nice for traveling also, takes up small space. your charging cord fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JnJ love

customer_reviews.title: It works for a 44mm series 5
customer_reviews.text: It works for a 44mm Series 5 with a OtterBox bumper case. You can see the charging icon with the charging number. You must put the charger in correctly in order for it to charge. Takes up very little space which is why I bought it. I guess its to hi/tech for some people LOL!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This feels like it may be weighted at tje bottom because it doesnt slode around or topple over. Its a snug fit for the charger cable so that ensures its not falling out or off centered. The "bezel" is flexible so I imagine if you have a case or protector it might fit. The whole thing feels powder coated which protects against scratches. I really enjoy this charging stand. I actually give them out as tokens to friends and strangers.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: A novelty with benefits.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very practical and amusing apple watch stand. I bought one for my dad as a present because it looked fun and was surprised to discover how effectively it held the watch in place. On most apple watch stands it is pretty easy to accidentally knock your watch off the magnetic charger. This is the first charging stand that I have tried that holds the watch securely in place without relying entirely upon the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Solid and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: The stand is solid and stable. The design mimics an old MAC very well, down to the hole needed for ejecting the disk. The Mag charger fits very well with no play whatsoever. The new apple watch series 4, 44mm, fits the mold perfectly and charges exactly as it should. If you tap the watch at night to see the time, you may move the stand but it is not likely that you will knock it over. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me smile every time I use it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 40mm Series 4. Part of me braced for disappointment, but it looks as good as the images. I like it so much I bought some for my friends. If you usually pack your charging cable when you leave the house, then I would recommend buying a dedicated charging cable for this stand. Adding and removing the charging cable isn't hard, but it's also not as easy as unplugging a phone charger from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice accessory for your Apple Watch. Not only is it super cute and looks amazing, but it’s a really nice piece of rubber and is incredibly solid. It’s a little heaver and bigger than I thought but on my desk it looks nice and it’s stable enough that it doesn’t move around too much when unplugging the watch. There’s not much to say about it. It’s a nice accessory and is pretty cheap. It’s a great gift for someone who loves old computers and new technology.
customer_reviews.author: @Tech

customer_reviews.title: Expected more.
customer_reviews.text: Feeding in your charger isn’t super easy. In fact the way that it feeds impacts how the watch connects to the charger. I was excited to use when it arrived. You have to put your watch in specifically dial up. I woke up the next morning and the watch was dead because it didn’t lay against the charger well enough because the charger is so flush and flat with the rubbery piece, the center of the charger doesn’t connect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lebron

customer_reviews.title: This item is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: While it is a very pretty item and works very well, I bought it under the impression that it includes the charging cable. I was looking for a means to charging my iWatch; not an ornament. I was surprised when I received it and discovered that this is not a charger. It is simply an add-on ornament. You still need to buy the charging cable separately. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Mata

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEVICE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE EASY WAY TO CHARGE YOUR APPLE WATCH. THE CHARGER AND THE WATCH DO NOT BECOME SEPARATED AND THE WATCH IS STILL AVAILABLE FOR YOU TO NOTE THE TIME. A SIMPLE DEVICE THAT PERFORMS ITS FUNCTION INEXPENSIVELY AND WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest little Apple Watch charging stand you will find . Absolutely love the nostalgia. This is a timeless item that will only get cooler with age. A little conversation starter at the least.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Previously my watch would be pulled by the tension of my charging cable off of my nightstand and onto the floor, waking me up and putting my screen at risk. This lovely little piece of rubber works well as a decoration, but also gives my watch a sturdy weight to keep it in place, and protection in the unlikely event my watch is still pulled off. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of College
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who has an Apple watch. This was my first computer I ever had in college. It looks just like the old MacIntosh. She loves it and it is useful as a nightstand storage tool for someone's Apple watch.
customer_reviews.author: JCSeminoles

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic and fun!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who remembers when the original 128K Macintosh came out (and still has it), this is the coolest Apple Watch stand I’ve seen. My series 3 watch fits perfectly and the display, in nightstand mode, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional item!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great find! It does a great job of keeping my Apple Watch on the charger all night. The charger fits inside the case snugly and easily and the watch does stay in Nightstand Mode whenever it's inside. The stand itself is very sturdy but not bulky or heavy. I love this and can't recommend it enough to Apple Watch users. This would make a great gift for anyone who has a Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & Cute too
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing, my dad even commented on it so I had to buy him one one just not the same color. This has been used daily since I purchased my Apple Watch and I love that it keeps it in place and I don’t have to worry about it sliding off my dresser and on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Cool blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool, not 100% functional, but really cool. I remember using the Apple IIIe and an early monochrome iMac. However, this won’t work with any bumper or other case on the watch. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: MacGrandPa

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, With a Vintage Touch
customer_reviews.text: I saw this online accidentally. I was looking for another Apple Watch. But I read the reviews because & realized I didn’t have a watch holder while charging. So I bought it & LOVED it. Then a day later I bought one for my friend! She loves it too!!
customer_reviews.author: CandaceMone't

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this  Watch charging stand. As a computer enthusiast, I enjoy the accuracy of the originally captured Macintosh computer. Furthermore, the watch on nightstand mode makes it look all the more authentic. Finally, the cord organization and ease of the product is appealing. Worthwhile buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand! As I got an Apple Watch for Christmas, I saw this and new I had it for my geeky nature. The case is made out stretchy, but durable, rubber so your Watch doesn’t get scratched. Though I was confused with how you’re supposed to install the wireless charger that comes with the watch, as it doesn’t come with an instruction book, but the videos on the amazon page does show how to insert it in. If you’re a geek, have an Apple Watch, and love old tech, this is a definite buy!
customer_reviews.author: SamuelzCool

customer_reviews.title: Ripped the back off my watch!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept, loved the way it looked on my nightstand...then one morning I pulled my watch out of the stand and the back of the watch stayed behind. This was using the same charging cable I’ve used for years. Hundreds of dollars later, I have a new watch on my wrist and this thing is in the trash. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Doug

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I like the color of this model (it's combined with the Apple Watch's band). I bought the AirPods case too, so they are combined. I bought this model because my cat "ate" the charging station that I bought last year 😅 (I think that was in revenge because I traveled in my holiday and I didn't take him with me). The moral of this story is that for my next travel, I'll hide the charging station along with the other cute things.
customer_reviews.author: SAYDEE LOPEZ NAVARRO

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Since i have a metal watch band thats always in a loop its slightly more effort to connect to the standard charger but with this mount i can just drop the watch in every night. Plus its great when sleeping away from home I can easily use it as a nightstand clock.
customer_reviews.author: tornadosandwich

customer_reviews.title: Moving Parts?
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid, by my bedside, sits up, bump the stand, tells me it's to early to get up for about 12 seconds. Nothing to break, no batteries, with nostalgia enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Makes charging Apple Watch so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself when I got My watch and this one for a Friend who just got one. So easy to put your watch in and charge all night without loose magnet to fuss with.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Bedside clock
customer_reviews.text: Really like hoe it has become my bedside clock. Just a tap and I know the time. Sometimes the watch becomes disengaged from the charger so I need to press it back to become the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Gave it 3 stars, but not for looks or build
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to plop your watch in the slot, that's it. The front cover is very wobbly and in person this thing just doesn't look good. It is also easy to wire your charger into it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great apple watch nightstand with the retro feel!
customer_reviews.text: I had a 3d printed version and it didn't flex like this rubbery version does... not worried about scratching my watchface on the continuous pulling up and pushing down on the PLA type plastic. The base is sturdy, and there is a nice slot at the back for the cable. I have the 38mm version and it fits great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Karl E. Kristjánsson

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: This is our third order of this stand It is great. It is a bit heavy and clunky for traveling, but we still take it in our carry on, so it's fine. Be advised they also have a W4 that resembles the early, 2nd get iMac. We're very happy with it (we have several).
customer_reviews.author: Roger J Owens

customer_reviews.title: NO CHARGER INCLUDED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my charging cable and would like to buy a new one yesterday. After finding this charging station I find the looking is cute so it may be a good idea to buy one while charge my Apple Watch. While after unpacking the package I just realized it's a PURE station without charging functionality. You need to provide you own charging cable instead. Now I need to buy another cable to have my watch running.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Y

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with case
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute product and looks awesome with the watch in there, but there are connectivity issues with the protective case I have on the watch. You’ll think it’s charging but it’s not. So, if you don’t have a case, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb G.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It works. Easy to use. Weighted so it doesn't move around. One thing, if you have a case on your watch, it probably won't work. My work watch has a case on it and would not charge with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy rubber - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this charger stand. I like that it displays the watch as a clock since it’s horizontal. I bought this because I thought it was so cute - duh! But I was more than pleasantly surprised at the weight and material (rubber). It’s sturdy and works great!
customer_reviews.author: TobysMommyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The perfect stand for an Apple fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is stand is perfect. It turns my super modern Apple Watch into a super vintage Mac! The slot for the floppy is great!. The stand is made of a nice heavy rubbery material. It's nice and solid. I like that the cable doesn't make any sharp bends (my previous stand required a 90 degree bend in the cable which probably isn't so great long term.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Clare

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Apple Watch stand
customer_reviews.text: This is actually way nicer than expected. Looks cool, is super easy to put the watch in, and was inexpensive. This wouldn't even be possible without Apple's nightstand mode, which is automatic and works well. This is by far my favorite Apple Watch stand. I've tried a few and most of them either tip over or are less convenient than just using the charger by itself.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Awe Memories
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so, I didn’t need this thing..... but I needed this thing LoL I was a kid when this Mac came out. I still remember using it in the school library. This little charger holder was too good to pass up. It’s cute and serves a purpose. It’s very sturdy and holds my watch on the charger. I would so buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: MeLizBela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch Stand
customer_reviews.text: This item works perfectly and exactly as expected. The watch never separates from the charging disk. Love the retro look of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on my nightstand
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple little thing...really cool for us pre 1987 Mac users. I can reach out and touch it, it turns on for a few seconds and goes back to sleep. Being stable as it is, it also keeps my watch from sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: Kyosaku

customer_reviews.title: Clever little gadget to hold my Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget fits perfectly on my end table. My watch is easy to read and there are no tangled wires. So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale for a gift and it's a heavy little thing! Love the weight though as it holds the watch well and won't be knocked over easily. Gives the watch screen that retro Apple classic look. Now I'm waiting to get myself one as well!
customer_reviews.author: nommonster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't just look super cool. It IS super cool.
customer_reviews.text: I use to own one of these Macs, so, yes, the nostalgia factor is high. That said, these things are designed really well and made even better. My wife and son use these things as their primary charging stations and they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Romero

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and functional, well-made product. Fun: Looks like a mini Macintosh, just like the one I used in college. I plan to find a tiny Apple logo to glue onto the front, to complete the look. Functional:My Series 2 Apple watch slides easily into and out of this charging "dock." I like how a light tap on the nightstand or the mini-Mac wakes the watch so I can see what time it is during the night.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Very good accessory
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blacked out version and it makes it look like a cute mini tv :) - its way better than having the watch lay flat - a simple tap on the surface will make the watch wake so you can see the time quickly
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Makes me smile every time I see it
customer_reviews.text: OMG I absolutely love this. It holds my watch perfectly, doesn't take up a lot of nightstand space and makes me smile every time I see the time light up in "nightstand mode." I take this with us traveling, too, and it works out great.
customer_reviews.author: TBG

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this little charger stand. I had one of these Macs, so this is a nice little piece of nostalgia. The Apple charger fits nicely, and the watch sits against it without additional fussing. Just plain cute!
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Easier to see the time in nightstand mode
customer_reviews.text: Holds my watch nicely in nightstand view and the angle makes it easier to see the time from my pillow, PLUS it is super cute. Putting the charger in this stand was easy, and it is so easy to just drop the watch into the holder and it automatically aligns to charge.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Great for Nostalgia and Functional
customer_reviews.text: For a long-time Apple fan, this is a fun way to charge my Apple Watch that works really well. I was originally nervous that it would be difficult to get the watch in and out, but it couldn't be simpler! The silicon is flexible, yet strong. I had a previous charging stand, but this one is so much better. What a fun product.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Roger

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: My watch dies not stay connected to the charger when in the stand. Very hard to get the cord through the opening. But cute!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like about it is that it isn’t really convenient to use if you have any type of guard on your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple Watch stand,something for all Apple Computer enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.text: The rubberized stand allows your watch to slide in and out without scratches to the surface. Its really cute. I often stare at it and just enjoy the novelty of a mini- vintage Macintosh. I've gotten compliments from many people regarding the aesthetic. It's small and compact standing at approximately 2.5 inches tall. (Note: it does NOT come with the charger cable, ideally you use the cable that came with your Apple watch, so don't look to purchasing this item as a secondary watch stand with it's own plug. It doesn't have one.)
customer_reviews.author: Lennon Graves

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: Used for holding my Apple Watch at night. My Kitty was always knocking my watch off of the charger. This holder works perfect for holding my watch in place. I’m very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The MUST HAVE accessory for Apple Geeks
customer_reviews.text: There is no question in my mind that this is the most fun little thing I've purchased in a while. The design is ingenious. It works EXACTLY as advertised. Hope they will be in stock soon, since the link with this circulated around Apple and just from my employee friends who purchased one, I can see why they are back ordered. If you don't got one of these - you ain't one of the "cool kids".
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spencer-Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch stand!
customer_reviews.text: It holds the watch securely, giving you "alarm clock" mode while it charges. And has the cool retro Mac look to boot.
customer_reviews.author: mwstretch

customer_reviews.title: I think this is adorable, but it also makes it easier to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is adorable, but it also makes it easier to keep the watch on the charger without being knocked off. I bought a second one after realizing how much I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: budgetista

customer_reviews.title: Great design, very useful and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive for such an awesome product. I use this every night at home and take it with me on trips. Completely replaces need for alarm clock. Time displays with just gentle touch to night stand. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very functional design and easy to slide in the watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very functional design, works very well. I selected this product because of its design. I like the fact that i can easily and quickly slide in the Apple Watch and it connects every time. The non-slip and non-sticky base is also very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Quartz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little watch stand! holds my apple watch securely in place so it doesn't slip off the charger at night, and protects it when it inevitably gets bumped off my nightstand, the watch does not fall out and is protected by the rubber! Everyone that sees this little charger stand that has an apple watch wants one! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous RN

customer_reviews.title: Great little charger
customer_reviews.text: This small device holds my third Apple watch. I bought it as a gift to my daughter. She likes it as well. Great inexpensive solution for charging your Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard A. Wien, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: You snap in the standard Apple charger disc, drop in your Watch and you're done. And it looks cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hatten

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: A neat little bedside stand with high nerd appeal for old Macs. The Apple Watch won’t display the time constantly while charging, but just a quick touch to the top of this little thing causes the time to display.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially if u like being different. Fits watch perfectly even when the watch has a case
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this watch holder since I first saw it. It's got a nice weight to hold the watch still, makes contact 100% of the time and just touching it triggers the time display. Most of all, it's so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesBgoode

customer_reviews.title: Cute but functional
customer_reviews.text: Clean, simple fun. Holds the magnetic charger solidly and allows the watch to be inserted and removed easily. I've used a Series 1 and Series 2 and both work perfectly. I got the "oriiginal" Macintosh cream color and it doesn't show dust on my bedside table which I like. Stays in place nicely too. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G. Corcoran

product_meta.title: elago W3 Stand Designed for Apple Watch Stand Compatible with iWatch Series 5, Series 4, 3, 2, 1, (44mm, 42mm, 40mm, 38mm), Support Nightstand Mode, Original Design Awards [White] (Patent Pending)
feature_bullets: 【VINTAGE DESIGN】 View your Apple Watch display through a blast from the past. The display lines up perfectly to seem as though it is the display of an old Apple monitor.
【EASY TO USE】 Simply place your Apple Watch on the stand to charge your watch; keep this stand near your bed to allow use of key functions such as alarm clocks and messages.
【MATERIAL】 The elago W3 is made from scratch-free silicone to prevent damage to your Apple Watch and to prevent it from moving around when resting on a surface.
【COMPATIBILITY】 Works with all Apple Watch Series 1,2,3,4 and 5 and is compatible with Apple Watch Nightstand Mode (WatchOS 2 or Latest Version)
【WARRANTY】 Purchase with confidence! 30 day, 100% Money Back Guarantee & 1 Year Replacement Warranty. (DISCLAIMER: Charging Cable and Apple Watch are NOT INCLUDED.)
